name: Form the Beat
description:
The Rhythm based game where you need to avoid red thingy. Keep yourself connect with the other. Get the highest score and post it in the comment!! 

DETAIL :  

You are Circle. Keep yourself and other connected. Avoid the red thingy.  Enjoy the rhythm. Have fun !! 

CONTROL :  DetailKeysMove PlayerMove your MouseStart the GameSpace MUSIC : 

Music used in the game are from the Undertale which is remixed by Toni Leys. 

Song used - Shop theme
